name: Vague authentication request

context.domain: User authentication for a SaaS web application

userMessages.content: I want users to be able to log in.
Yeah, email and password should work. We might add social login later but not now.
Sessions should last a reasonable amount of time. We don't want people getting logged out too often but also need it to be secure. Maybe a few hours?
I think that covers it for now. We can add more later.

expectedOpenQuestions: What happens after too many failed login attempts?
What are the exact session timeout requirements?
